content:
You decide to take a moment to reflect on your journey and the impact you have on others. You think about all the people you have helped and how you have made a positive impact on their lives. You feel fulfilled and satisfied by the work you have done. You also think about all the lessons you have learned on your journey so far, and how they have helped you to become a better person.

You take some time to meditate and journal about your experiences, and you appreciate the beautiful view from the Tiferet, or beauty, realm. You realize that you have grown not only in terms of balance and harmony but also in terms of compassion, empathy, and understanding.

With this new understanding and growth, you feel ready to continue your journey and take on the next realm, the Netzach, or victory, which represents the masculine aspect of creation.

As you move on, you come across a group of warriors who are preparing for a battle to defend their land.

What would you like to do?

A) Keep moving forward and continue your journey, ignoring the group
B) Offer your help and use your newfound compassion and understanding to help the group
C) Attempt to impose your own balance and harmony on the group

Please pick one of the options above (A,B,C) to continue.
